Title: How to Do More Than Just Break Even in Business
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       The things to keep in mind when deciding if you’re going to sell your business

•       The best formula to estimate the value of a business when buying one

•       How a business owner’s salary may be putting the future of his business in jeopardy 

•       What to pay attention to when you have minimal profit margins and how to turn that around
